name: subneintr2d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wne(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)))

stmt.origin: mpbird(w0, wne(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wne(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wb(wne(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wne(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wb(wne(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wne(c0, c2)))

stmt.origin: necon3bid(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1), c0, c2, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wne(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wne(c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wceq(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wceq(c0, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)), wceq(c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))

comment: Introducing subtraction on both sides of a statement of inequality. Contrapositive of ~ subcan2d . (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
